src:
Real Madrid Malu-Malu Kucing, Tau Barcelona Kalah Malah Diam Saja
03 Nov 2019, 09:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid mulai terbiasa dengan situasi pasang-surut ekstrem sejak musim lalu. Akibatnya, hasil imbang 0-0 dengan Real Betis, Minggu (3/11/2019) dini hari WIB tadi tidak lagi mengejutkan.
Hasil imbang ini terbilang buruk, Madrid membuang peluang emas untuk merebut takhta puncak klasemen sementara dari Barcelona. Saat ini Madrid ada di peringkat ke-2 dengan 22 poin, Barca hanya unggul selisih gol.
Memiliki pemain-pemain top seperti Karim Benzema, Eden Hazard, dan Sergio Ramos ternyata masih belum cukup bagi Madrid. Mereka gagal memaksimalkan peluang melawan tim dengan pertahanan terburuk di La Liga musim ini.
Zidane harus segera memperbaiki kekurangan timnya ini. Scroll ke bawah ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Real Madrid Shy Cat, Know Barcelona Lose Even Silence
Nov 3 2019, 09:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid have become accustomed to extreme tidal situations since last season. As a result, the 0-0 draw with Real Betis on Sunday (3/11/2019) early morning WIB was no longer surprising.
The draw was somewhat bad, Madrid threw away a golden opportunity to win the throne of the top standings from Barcelona. Currently Madrid is ranked 2nd with 22 points, Barca only on goal difference.
Having top players like Karim Benzema, Eden Hazard and Sergio Ramos is apparently not enough for Madrid. They failed to maximize their chances against the team with the worst defense in La Liga this season.
Zidane must immediately correct his team's shortcomings. Scroll down, Bolaneters!
